name: EvaMariaBot
description: When you going to send file on telegram channel this bot will save that in database, So you can search that easily in inline mode

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable env variables

CHANNELS.description: Username or ID of channel or group. Separate multiple IDs by space.

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of Admin. Separate multiple Admins by space.

PICS.description: Add some telegraph link of pictures .

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Bot Logs,Give a channel id with -100xxxxxxx

AUTH_USERS.description:
Username or ID of users to give access of inline search. Separate multiple users by space.
Leave it empty if you don't want to restrict bot usage.

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: ID of channel.Make sure bot is admin in this channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use bot.

DATABASE_URI.description: mongoDB URI. Get this value from https://www.mongodb.com. For more help watch this video - https://youtu.be/dsuTn4qV2GA

DATABASE_NAME.description: Name of the database in mongoDB. For more help watch this video - https://youtu.be/dsuTn4qV2GA

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collections. Defaults to Telegram_files. If you are using the same database, then use different collection name for each bot

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode messages

URL.description: The Heroku App URL similar to https://<appname>.herokuapp.com/

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: optional: a chat where your replied saved messages are stored, to stop people deleting their old

SUDO_USERS.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered sudo users

SUPPORT_USERS.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered support users (can gban/ungban, nothing else)

WHITELIST_USERS.description: A space separated list of user_ids which should be considered whitelisted - they can't be banned.

DONATION_LINK.description: Optional: link where you would like to receive donations.

PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks

DEL_CMDS.description: Whether to delete commands from users which don't have rights to use that command

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

ALLOW_EXCL.description: Whether to allow using exclamation marks ! for commands as well as /.

BAN_STICKER.description: Which sticker to use when banning people. Use https://telegram.dog/ShowJsonBot to get the file_id
